lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I care about other people. I want to learn about people outside the USA.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school to learn.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: not giving back is a poor choice
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand their medications.

lender.name: Jedidiah
lender.loan_because: To those whom I help: There is a blessed question to ponder: "When, Lord, did I see You hungry and feed You...?" The fact is that regardless of where you live in our world, you are my neighbor - a neighbor with whom I am privileged to share my material goods in the form of an interest-free loan. And as you pay it back, I will again joyfully share it with more of our brothers and sisters. I am with each of you in spirit and in prayer.
lender.occupational_info: I look for ways to help people - and then I help them! I'd like to be able to start every day by making at least one Kiva loan.

lender.name: Delise
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best idea in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites easier for people to use.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in public school to students whose first language is not English.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: This is a very feasible way for me to give and make it a cycle!
lender.occupational_info: I am a single mom and law student expected to graduate 2012.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I take care of animal hearts :)

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I love to help people meet their dreams. Sustainability and independence is a great way to build peace.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I loan out of gratitude to all the people who helped me when I worked in the corporate world, and who later helped me start my own very small (one-person) business. In a sense, I loan to repay a debt that I can never truly repay to all those who helped me get my start. I plan to reinvest any repaid loans into new loans, so by repaying your loan you are also "paying forward" to someone else who is also looking to work hard to improve the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage and test new computer programs that researchers use to invent new drugs and medical devices. I feel very fortunate: I love my work!

lender.name: Trevor & Alva
lender.loan_because: we all need to help each other especially to people poorer than ourselves
lender.occupational_info: we are retired but spend a lot of time helping the poor and needy through St Vincent de Paul

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Collegiate Minister and Non Profit Professional
lender.loan_because: Jesus cares for our relational and physical needs.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I do not have a lot of money and I have a desire to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying economics at a school in Rexburg, Idaho, United States.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It helps everyone, even those not directly involved.A group effort by a bunch of strangers who otherwise would never cross paths. What's not to like?

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: It seems the fair thing to do, when I have so much good fortune with my family and where I live in New Zealand.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in my city to access information and services for free.

lender.name: Greg and the Gob5ive
lender.loan_because: We love the entire process. Reading the individual stories of entrepreneurs, chosing the projects we like most, getting updates from borrowers. Then see our money come back, and send it for another round of good deeds.
lender.occupational_info: I design video games. I define the rules of the game, story and characters. I work with engineers and artists to develop the games people will play on their consoles.

lender.name: Sjoerd
lender.loan_because: Giving people a start can change lives.
lender.occupational_info: Selling IT related business

lender.name: Tim Lynn Jillian
lender.loan_because: It is easy for me and means so much to you
lender.occupational_info: I am on a team that sells telecommunications solutions to big business

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the American dream of success through hard work and innovation, and I wish to give other the opportunity to have a good life. Everyone deserves a chance at success, and I'd like to help people where I can do exactly that.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am working to put myself through college so I can make a better life for myself. I'm currently seeking a degree in Management of Information Systems. It is hard work, but nothing worth while in life comes free or easy.

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I run websites, and help promote other people's.

lender.name: Mats Bleikelia
lender.loan_because: In a society of little economic development, universal inactivity accompanies universal poverty. You survive not by struggling against nature, or by increasing production, or by relentless labor; instead you survive by expending as little energy as possible, by striving constantly to achieve a state of immobility. (Ryszard Kapuscinski)

lender.name: Dorothea
lender.loan_because: I believe very much in Gandhi's "Be the change you want to see in the world"; Kiva is a great way of making a positive difference to someone's life.

lender.name: Byron
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: kaliman
lender.loan_because: everybody who can afford it should do it
lender.occupational_info: sitting in front of a computer and trying to make processes in large companies more efficient

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: If I can offer some little help to unfortunates then thank God I can do that.

lender.name: Nanthi & Ramesh
lender.loan_because: hard work should be rewarded.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small college in the United States.

lender.name: iQ Ingenieros
lender.whereabouts: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria Las Palmas
lender.loan_because: Somos una empresa social con responsabilidades sociales.
lender.occupational_info: Nos dedicamos al desarrollo de software a medida, entre otras cosas.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to make their lives better. Loans given to help support an entrepreneur can make a positive impact on a whole community!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a swimming centre supervising the pools and instructing aquatic fitness classes.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: ...it is a shame to see poor, desperate people on TV who work only for paying the interests of their credits. There is a good reason for nearly all world religions to prohibit lending money for interests...

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Helping people feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a glorified bookkeeper.

lender.name: Fábio
lender.loan_because: I believe in people's efforts to make this world a better one.
lender.occupational_info: I study and I am currently performing scientific investigation on the area of computer science.

lender.name: Mira & David
lender.loan_because: more people will have a chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info:
Mira's work is taking care of financial transactions. She likes the company and the people and is happy, even if it is not an important job. David works ad-interim, making deals for companies, often for large amounts. Still the work has become less interesting because it is increasingly becoming a desk job. The paperwork/administration has grown and the company-visits and negotiations have decreased.
We hope to find some fulfillment in aiding others who are really producing for primary needs, and that we can help in this way.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I can and because I care.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a cancer research lab as a secretary.

lender.name: Adam and Lauren
lender.loan_because: Adam and Lauren are two very wonderful individuals that care about world issues. And as we all know: Sharing is Caring!!

lender.name: hannah
lender.occupational_info: I am currently on my way to teach and work with refugees in northern Thailand.

lender.name: Shim
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help at times. Lending enables people to become self sufficient.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed in what they want to do.
lender.occupational_info: I used to sell yarn and teach knitting. I am retired now.

lender.name: Felix Mohr
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world in little steps.

lender.name: GloStat
lender.loan_because: As entrepreneurs we know a little investment can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: We create "sports statistics" for everyday life. In other words, we count what we see people do, outside of the sports world.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: People, especially women and children, need it. I want these women and children to have the same advantages that I do. And I hope once they prosper, each "Pays it forward," in their own community.

lender.name: Drauzio
lender.loan_because: Um abraço - Drauzio Milagres - Entre no Blogger - O Mundo no Seu Dia-a-Dia - E faça seus comentários - http://drauziomilagres.blogspot.com
lender.occupational_info: Um abraço - Drauzio Milagres - Entre no Blogger - O Mundo no Seu Dia-a-Dia - E faça seus comentários - http://drauziomilagres.blogspot.com

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: To defy this capitalist system that seems falling down, where banks that earn millions don't give credit to this people. Para desafiar a este sistema capitalista que parece en ruinas, donde bancos con miles de millones en beneficios no dan crédito a estas personas.
lender.occupational_info: I work for NGOs as a consultant, helping them to improve their performance. Trabajo para ONGs como consultor, ayudándoles a mejorar su trabajo

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to give something back. I have been running my own business for 4 years at time of writing and I know how hard it is to get support when you are starting up.
lender.occupational_info: I run a web design company. We are based in Bromsgrove, Worcestershire in the UK. We create websites for small and medium-sized businesses.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people success.

lender.name: Paul and Gloria
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Maren
lender.loan_because: it is a respectful way of helping people.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: Givers Gain and Takers Lose, What You Put Out Comes Back.
lender.occupational_info: Webmaster for major companies and small business owners

lender.name: Jeannette
lender.loan_because: I believe even a small gesture can make a big impact.
lender.occupational_info: My son is my joy and purpose in life. I am also taking courses in environmental restoration, my second joy.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: our group of self employed women want to help other self employed women create or expand thier business
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs of babies, childen, wedding and other events.

lender.name: David R.
lender.loan_because: After 15+ years in another business I got tired of being "part of the problem" and wanted to be part of the solution. Then I remembered something I heard Jesse Jackson say during his first Presidential Campaign, "people need a hand-up, not a hand out!" I believe Kiva is devoted to that idea so here I am. I realized the better world I wanted to see doesn't begin with others, it begins with me. It begins at my keyboard, in my viewfinder, my lense and my heart.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team of professional people to make films and documentaries.

lender.name: Dave & JoAnn
lender.loan_because: We have served in developing countries and know the benefits of this type of lending.
lender.occupational_info: We are small business owners that clean carpeting, upholstery, tile and grout flooring and wood flooring.

lender.name: federico
lender.loan_because: is useful and equal
lender.occupational_info: I instruct the pilot about their actions in the air

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a positive difference in the world.

lender.name: Be Legendary
lender.loan_because:
I am addicted to making a difference in the lives of others.
Also, I believe in the power of entrepreneurship and small business. It is the #1 way to bring communities above the poverty level. So lending to small business around the world makes sense.
Lastly, I dislike simply giving hand-outs, though I do that as well. I like that the entrepreneurs are simply looking for some help to get their business going and repay the loan with their success.
Go Kiva!
lender.occupational_info:
I help people discover their strengths and understand the basic framework for how to create a Legendary Life.
I do this mostly through corporate work and creating Legendary Experiences so people can feel what it is like to Be Legendary.

lender.name: Hongqing
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle that giving fishnet is better than giving fish.
lender.occupational_info: I am a risk manager and portfolio strategist with 10+ years experience in the lending industry.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I appreciate that through Kiva people across the world are being empowered. Thank you for letting me help.

lender.name: OLS 327
lender.loan_because: We are doing this as a class project on microloans and we believe in their cause and we as a group appreciate Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students taking a class about Global Leadership.

lender.name: Corapi
lender.loan_because: Teach kids about the world & in order to make a difference in individual lives.
lender.occupational_info: Lou is a finance manager, Mia is a full-time Mom, the kids are starting school and having fun

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help to get off the ground in this world. I want to help those in return to all of those who have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I want to help and bless people. I want to bring them hope through Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Adriaan
lender.loan_because: Because everyone deserves opportunities to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because:
Poverty= misuse of resources= harmful to the environment
kiva=loans=opportunity

lender.name: Tyson
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm headed to Eastern Asia in 2 months. We will see when I get there.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites.

lender.name: Sung Cho
lender.occupation: Co-Founder and Dad for the Van Beek Kids
lender.loan_because: He told us to... : )
lender.occupational_info: Social Entrepreneur committed in giving back 50% of our company's (www.VanBeekKids.com) profit to the cause of the widows and orphans.

lender.name: Coral
lender.loan_because: I like to be an active part in helping the less fortunate help themselves

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: End-To-End is the New World Order! People helping People. Thanks Kiva for making it so easy. Times are tough, but I will add some money to the pool when I can.

lender.name: Gerard
lender.loan_because: I feel better helping other people...
lender.occupational_info: I do hardly any work for money that is prodigious for a resident of the World and satisfactory for a resident of United Kingdom...

lender.name: Frankspeare
lender.loan_because: I used to be poor. I know what it's like. I regret the way that capitalism and the US Government exploit the poor. I want to make a difference and make a personal contribution to this world being a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I get to do what I love, which is playing music, and I am blessed to be paid for it. I also work as a security guard to make sure that I can pay my bills.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.occupation: Sales Excute for spray booth filters

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It feels good and is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I manage small businesses and properties for clients.

lender.name: Claude
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and in people improving their lives with pride.

lender.name: Gar
lender.loan_because: somebody made me

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I study the Bible to see how I can make a difference in other people's lives.

lender.name: Ardaleth
lender.loan_because: I can and I enjoy helping others
lender.occupational_info: I love learning new things and foreign languages

lender.name: Noni
lender.loan_because: it feels great to connect with people around the world and to assist those who are motivated to better their living conditions. We adopted our daughter from Cali, Colombia in 1991 and I've been searching for other ways to connect in social service!
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are committed to bettering their finances and health by connecting them with high impact nutrition and business opportunity. We work in teams to support each other's visions.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe in karma, and the best karma is realized through helping those who want to help themselves and who end up helping others as a result of their efforts. And so on and so on... :)
lender.occupational_info: I make jewelry and invest in real estate.

lender.name: Sandiip
lender.loan_because: "What people need is not charity but an opportunity"

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: sometimes good people need a helping hand
lender.occupational_info: My fiance and I are trying to save for our wedding on Oct 3, 2010 in Woodbury, NY at the Fox Hollow.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I love the Lord and He would do this.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a born-again Christian in love with Jesus and showing His love to anyone and everyone I can!

lender.name: Rajesh
lender.loan_because: i believe in hardwork and sincerity
lender.occupational_info: i work every day to earn and to pay back what i have loaned , i invest in real estate and earn money .

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Hopefully to help someone change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I've been very fortunate to make a living doing something I enjoy. And, hopefully help others to get involved.

lender.name: Zachery
lender.loan_because: I support small businesses via my job every day via software, but here is a chance to have a more direct effect.
lender.occupational_info: I work on financial software for small businesses, specifically the payroll for employees.

lender.name: Heike
lender.loan_because: I have (so far :-) been quite lucky in life and could/can afford a good life. I want to help others living under less lucky conditions by supporting them to build up a solid basis of their livelihood with their own hands and with a little help from their friends.

lender.name: Neeraj
lender.loan_because: Lot of genuine and hard working people across the world need that little help to lift themselves out of poverty and be self sustained.
lender.occupational_info: Retailer of Wireless Products.

lender.name: Amanda Peña
lender.occupation: Student at the George Washington University
lender.loan_because: I lived in Peru and learned how powerful micro-loans are and how a small amount of capital can fundamentally change the way a person earns his livelihood. I want to be able to give back, but as a student, I do not have the means to simply give. Kiva allows me the opportunity to make smart loans while inspiring entrepreneurship and helping people to improve their lives.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I am interested in seeing what someone will do given a decent chance.

lender.name: Engrid
lender.loan_because: I believe you have to help your worldwide family.
lender.occupational_info: I make gemstone beaded jewelry and sell at fairs and shows.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I answer questions for children.

lender.name: JPH
lender.loan_because: I can! It's that simple. Helping out when others are in need of assistance should be that simple :)
lender.occupational_info: I run sales/marketing and a lot more for a computer networking equipment maker.

lender.name: Mesa
lender.loan_because: If everyone had the chance to peacefully and fairly provide for themselves and their families, this world would be a different place.

lender.name: paulette
lender.loan_because: it is satisfying for me to know that I am helping a deserving person to fillful an ambition or dream to better his or her life
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired stay at home wife.

lender.name: Ellis Sirait
lender.loan_because: I love giving...

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: You might not always be the big dog.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Motto: You take what you need and give what you can. People have helped me when I needed it, now i have a chance to give some back.
lender.occupational_info: When I was able to work, I helped children to be able to talk better, and old people who had trouble being able to eat. Now I am retired because I am disabled and can no longer work, but I am lucky enough to still have enough for a good life, so I feel good about sharing.

lender.name: Anders
lender.occupational_info: I work with production of renewable energy from organic wastes.

lender.name: Fi Sproule
lender.loan_because: its important to help out on a global scale as well as doing it locally. We are all one earth family and its an honour to be able to do this.
lender.occupational_info: I am working on Aboriginal Community in the Tanami Desert in Australia. I am the youth worker here and I work with young people to give them a better understanding of the outside world and keep them seeking to keep their traditional way. Its a wonderful job and I get to hang with the most wonderful young people

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe we can all make a difference, no matter how small. Kiva gives us the opportunity to make a big impact with a small donation!

lender.name: Cullen
lender.loan_because: I for once feel that my little bit of help is truly having a big impact in the world.

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: Folks who can spare a cent - should! (Leute die einen Groschen entbehren koennen - sollten)

lender.name: Marjorie
lender.loan_because: We are all citizens of the same planet.
lender.occupational_info: Learning about the world around us and how we fit into it.

lender.name: Elies Campo
lender.loan_because: With Kiva we can make huge positive impact all around the world. My humble contribution to help people around the world improve their lives.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.occupational_info: I am a math and science teacher who works with students in grades seven and eight (11-14 year olds). I love working with this age group- they're energetic, passionate, creative, and hilarious to be around!

lender.name: Ella
lender.loan_because: The world needs to become more interconnected and I love helping this come true. We are not one in a sea of many, we are one who has taken many forms.
lender.occupational_info: I love learning.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because:
"No problem of human destiny is beyond human beings. Man's reason and spirit have often solved the seemingly unsolvable - and we believe they can do it again."
John F. Kennedy
lender.occupational_info: Health care quality improvement

lender.name: Norriene
lender.loan_because: Community Service is my love language. I get satisfaction from helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an International Accounting firm and my home office is Harrisburg, Pennsylvania in the USA.

lender.name: Eve and Storm
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance at their dreams.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: it is another way to pay it forward. I like the concept, the fact that small loans can make a big difference, and that it is a way to help bring peace and security to other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the mental health department of heath care cooperative.

lender.name: Chiqui
lender.loan_because:
love people who strive to help themselves.
helping is another way of getting happiness.
lender.occupational_info: Working at least 8 hours a day in front of a computer.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: God loves those who help others
lender.occupational_info: Helping people find homes

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: I can't change the world but by making some of my money available to others, I hope to make someone's life a little bit easier, make some people a little bit happier, and spread goodwill.
lender.occupational_info: I am the receptionist at a busy law firm in Florida, USA, where I handle phone calls, greet clients and visitors. During quiet moments I look out the 19th floor window towards the Atlantic ocean and think about the people I have met in faraway places during my annual month-long vacation.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: To bless others as I have been blessed
lender.occupational_info: I talk on the telephone alot. I try to help the people I talk to.

lender.name: Maryland Wrestling
lender.loan_because: I know we can make a difference in the world one dollar at a time.
lender.occupational_info: We are student-athletes at the University of Maryland.

lender.name: Lori & Neil
lender.loan_because: the world is only as strong as it's least fortunate. Together we can empower each other.
lender.occupational_info: We're both teachers.

lender.name: Yoriko
lender.loan_because: I want to have a happier world for everyone!

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: "To those who have been given much, much is asked of them." I believe in giving a lending hand to those who are willing to put in the effort to make a better life for themselves, the lives of their family and others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an experienced finance professional in all areas of finance including accounting, foreign exchange management, cash management, strategic planning, work process flow design, and internal auditing.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to make life a little better for other women who are having a hard time of it,. This is my way of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I do volunteer work withpeople who have cancer and who have 2 months or less to live.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: Supporting sustainable growth around the world is not only a moral mandate, it is the best possible investment in our collective future.
lender.occupational_info: I create tools for technology pioneers around the world

lender.name: Christmas Fund
lender.loan_because: Our family wants to contribute together as a group. We wanted to become connected more with each other in a common endeavor and we wanted to become connected more broadly in our global community.
lender.occupational_info: Dad works for an energy company, mom is a nurse, Patrick is a doctor, Natasha is a nurse and photographer, Jen is a student and mother of five, Sarah is an attorney and mother of two, Harry is an attorney, Daniel is a student and Suzie is a student.

lender.name: Kristofer
lender.loan_because: I want to help share the opportunities given to me with others.
lender.occupational_info: I design air-conditioning and ventilation systems for public schools in Texas. I also play music to help bring happiness to myself and those around me.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Christ has blessed me and my family, and if I can help someone else then I'm just doing my part!
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes to various places in Alaska, moving people and supplies.

lender.name: Jojo
lender.loan_because: I don't have sufficient funds to sustain.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small cell shop and school supplies. I want to replicate it and need more finances. I love my work.

lender.name: Vessa
lender.loan_because: we want to help entreprenuers since we are also female entreprenuers
lender.occupational_info: We teach people to read the aura.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it helps people!
lender.occupational_info: Genetics and genealogy.

lender.name: Tom Wright
lender.loan_because: I want to see if I can help someone with their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Cathay Pacific Airways and I am based out of Mumbai.

eEngineers provide outsourcing solutions in the areas of Architecture, Civil engineering, Structural engineering, Estimation and Quantity take off as well as MEP.

lender.name: Maralynn
lender.occupational_info: I plan meetings and events for corporations.

lender.name: Anan. Oupraxay
lender.loan_because: because we have only 1 life, why not trying to make it useful and contribute as we can to help the others ?
lender.occupational_info:
I work hard & start to lose hair on my head slowly lol. But the extra money that i can make during my spare time work,will be spent here to help someone else' life & projects.
My contribution may not be big, but i do believe that life is made of little goals & projects, no matter how big or small...

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: of international experience of poverty, mainly in India and Tanzania.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university teacher at University of Copenhagen, Denmark

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help improve their lives, as well as their families
lender.occupational_info: I assist businesses, organizations and associations locate a venue site to hold their meetings and events all over the world

lender.name: Angie
lender.occupation: U.S.C.G. First Class Petty Officer (Office Manager

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it makes sense! We can fight poverty!
lender.occupational_info: software developer

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Being a mom is the most fulfilling job in the world. Knowing that I'm raising and teaching three wonderful children to make a difference in this world - and to leave it a better place than they found it - is the best gift I can give them.

lender.name: Jerome
lender.loan_because: I can help someone possibly realize their dream . . .
lender.occupational_info: Software and Technology Sales that change the way business is done for the better.

lender.name: Eurodesk
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of people within Eurodesk Italy Organisation. Eurodesk is a permanent support structure of the European Commission's YOUTH Programme to provide high quality information and advice concerning Europe to young people and those who work with them.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: Some times it takes money to make money.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: of the generous God

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.name: Adrianne and Andrew
lender.loan_because: we are all connected in some small but meaningful way... physical, financial,emotional or spiritual- it may seem insignificant... but that is only perception - reality is we count on each other.

lender.name: Chichina
lender.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper....
lender.occupational_info: Purposeful

lender.name: Lila
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.

lender.name: Mark & Sheila
lender.loan_because: we can.
lender.occupational_info: We teach undergraduate students and future teachers at a university in southwest Florida, USA.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: it's right.
lender.occupational_info: creating bridges that connect microfinance institutions with socially conscious investors.

lender.name: Henry
lender.occupational_info: We provide systems in mass notification of large facilities... Fire Alarm,Biometric Systems for commercial applications..

lender.name: DAN
lender.loan_because: I like it!
lender.occupational_info: I design, engineer, and install audio-visual systems

lender.name: Acronimo
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity for my life.

lender.name: Lina
lender.loan_because: Farming is difficult and money is needed to buy all the tools and animals. I am happy to help .
lender.occupational_info: Before my disability I was farming I was raise on a big dairy farming and loved it . Now I help the farmers aound the world.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: My husband and I travel all over, and would like to help people in some of the countries that we have visited.

lender.name: Danielle Keister
lender.loan_because: I believe business ownership and entrepreneurship creates smarter, healthier, happier human beings and economies. I believe in a hand up, rather than hand-outs.
lender.occupational_info: Administrative Consulting expert. I help you ROCK IT in your admin support biz so you can knock the socks off clients & make more moolah! #AdminExperts @DanielleKeister

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Fam. ter Haar
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to help

lender.name: Online Marketer
lender.loan_because: micro-credits are MAXI-HELP!
lender.occupational_info:
I promot services, businesses and products over the Internet.
On the one hand, Internet marketing is a creative process (texts, images, ideas), on the other hand it has many technical aspects (coding and design). I also place media (i.e. banners and text-ads) on websites.
Search engine marketing (SEM), search engine optimization (SEO), banner ads on specific websites, email marketing, and social media.

lender.name: Jill
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer for Kiva, translating loans from Spanish and Russian to English. It is incredibly gratifying to know that my work impacts people all over the world so directly and quickly.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to help my brothers and sisters in their time of need and Kiva is a great opportunity to do that. Maybe someday I can meet those that I have helped and have a cup of coffee and a good conversation!
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer. I love to help people in anyway I can. I want to raise awareness to the different cultures and friendships that are possible on our planet.

lender.name: Rayna
lender.loan_because: I started my own small business in 2004 and know how difficult it can be to find the resources to be successful. I was fortunate to have a support network and I want to help others the way I was helped.
lender.occupational_info: I write books and I also copy edit/proofread books that other people write to be sure the information is error free before the books are published.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I like to share my blessings with others

lender.name: Christine
lender.occupation: Co-founder of Women for a Change

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: I've had lots of help along the way and think it is time I helped some others
lender.occupational_info: I help potential students choose educational courses which will help them to get a diploma or degree even if they have never studied at college or university before

lender.name: delis
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Satisfying and never ending.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: It's all about the baked goodies.
lender.occupational_info: I make tasty baked goods.

lender.name: Leah Cim
lender.loan_because: I see microfinance as my generation's answer to social injustice and poverty. Not only do these loans support small business owners, they also help to prevent human trafficking.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with small business owners and help them with the administrative operations of their company.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: All human beings are interconnected, one with all other elements in creation
lender.occupational_info: Manager of a high tech company

lender.name: David & Anntoinette
lender.loan_because: of our faith....in God and in man.
lender.occupational_info: both work in offices. She is an employee trainer. He is a business auditor.

lender.name: Larry
lender.occupational_info: I teach courses, advise students, and supervise research at a small college.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I'm a little low on good karma.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Why help with an 'am' when there's always a 'could'?

lender.name: Michael and Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: As liberal Catholics, we have loads of guilt to deal with.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: God has given me the opportunity and the means to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses maximize the value of their insurance policies.

lender.name: Kimberley
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount, can help someone else so much. Just think if everyone did this?.........wow, we really could change the world by giving people the resources needed to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Public Service

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I tend to look for loans that are bicycle related because I think the world needs more bikes not more cars. I have had many hands up in my life and just want to "pay it forward"!
lender.occupational_info: Family doctor in Thunder Bay Also involved with Bicycles for Humanity. Check out www.bicycles-for-humanity.org

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Even though I am a student and I don't have a lot of money, I realize the money I DO have is more than some people see in a lifetime... so instead of sitting on my money because I might need it someday, I want to give to people that can use it now.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Kind people have helped me in the past and if I can make someone else's life a little easier and brighter then that is good enough for me!
lender.occupational_info: Care for the ill and injured as well as promote healthy and safe lifestyles through education
